General.Name: Zhejiang Shibao Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Shibao Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, produces, and sells automotive steering systems and accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company offers electric power steering products, including electric power manual recirculating ball steering gear, electro-hydraulic power recirculating ball steering gear, double-pinion-assisted electric power steering, rack-assisted electric power steering, and column-assisted electric power steering; and intelligent steering products, such as steer-by-wire steering, lane keeping aid, intelligent steering for passenger cars, intelligent electric power manual recirculating ball steering gear, and intelligent electro-hydraulic power recirculating ball steering gear. It also provides hydraulic power steering gear products comprising dual circuit hydraulic power recirculating ball steering gear, hydraulic power recirculating ball steering gear, and hydraulic power rack and pinion steering gear; manual steering gear products, including manual recirculating ball steering gear and manual rack and pinion steering gear; and steering parts, such as electric four-way adjustable steering column, intermediate shaft for passenger cars and commercial vehicles, four-way adjustable steering column for commercial vehicles, pitman arm, hub bracket, manual four-way adjustable steering column for passenger cars, and ECU, as well as casting products. The company supplies steering products to automobile groups. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

4.Name: Ms. Xiao Ping  Liu
4.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Exec. Director
